amendment.description: Amendments en bloc offered by Mr. Thornberry, offered by Mr. Thornberry, comprised of the following amendments printed House Report 115-217 as en bloc No. 2: Nos. 36, 37, 38, 39, 40, 41, 42, 44, 45, 46, 47, 48, 50, 51, 52, and 53.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Thornberry amendments (A030) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendments en bloc (A030) offered by Mr. Thornberry.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
